watirwebdriver.com

Written by: bpettichord on October 7, 2011

*

Alister Scott has created a site dedicated to Watir WebDriver, the most elegant way to use webdriver with ruby. You will find anything you need to know about watir-webdriver gem there.

*Pictures represent (left to right): water, web, driver.
